problem_text:
A formation F of finite groups satisfies the Wielandt property for residuals if whenever U and V are subnormal subgroups of ⟨U, V⟩ in a finite group G, then the F-residual ⟨U, V⟩F of ⟨U, V⟩ coincides with ⟨UF, VF⟩. Does every Fitting formation F satisfy the Wielandt property for residuals?
A. Ballester-Bolinches
